overview: The tawdry story continues as women seduce other women, make them love them and leave them for others. Over two hours of cheating romance and seduction. The sex is steamy and seductive, slow and sultry; tongues lick every inch of smooth skin, lips press eagerly to their most tender parts, and sighs of ecstasy escape their mouths as they please one another and bring each other to the heights of passion!
title: Lesbian Triangles 17
